# compreprev

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An R package containing a shiny app to help with computational reproducibility reviews.

[Shiny App](https://rstudio-connect.psy.gla.ac.uk/compreprev) (draft)

## Installation

You can install the development version of compreprev from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("debruine/compreprev")
```

And launch the shiny app with:

``` r
compreprev::app()
```
